thread.title: Ground News - Inside the herculean efforts to rescue the operator of Johannesburg’s Rea Vaya bus system
thread.title_full: Ground News - Inside the herculean efforts to rescue the operator of Johannesburg’s Rea Vaya bus system

author: Daily Maverick
title: Ground News - Inside the herculean efforts to rescue the operator of Johannesburg’s Rea Vaya bus system
text:
Summary by Daily Maverick PioTrans, the operator of the Rea Vaya bus rapid transit system in Johannesburg , has been placed under business rescue. There have been several instances of mismanagement and maladministration at the company. Rea Vaya has confirmed that the bus service will continue to operate uninterrupted while its operating company is in the throes of business rescue. The post Inside the herculean efforts to rehabilitate the operator of Johannesburg’s Rea Vay… Share menu More
